message: I propose a 90/10 split in my favor. I think it's a fair starting point, considering I'm the one initiating the offer.
Alice, your offer was a bit lopsided. How about a 60/40 split? It's more equitable while still acknowledging your first-mover advantage.
I'm willing to compromise further, but I still believe a larger share is fair given my initial offer. Let's go with a 70/30 split this time.
Alice, it seems we both want a bigger piece of the pie. How about we meet in the middle with a 55/45 split?  This feels like a fair compromise to me.
